text: Yaa garee jinniifi namaa! Sila ergam-oonni isin irraa ta’an kan keeyyattoota kiyya isin irratti qara’aniifi qunnamtii guyyaa keessanii kana kan isin dinniinanu isinitti hin dhufnee?" (jedhamu)"Nuti lubbuu keenya irratti ragaa baanee jirra" jedhanJireenyi addunyaas isaan gowwoomsiteDhugumatti, isaan kaafiroota akka turan lubbuu isaanii irratti ragaa ba’an
